entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 06:19 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: W 27 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
